aboutPage.title: About BSN
aboutPage.subtitle: Our mission, vision and the team behind the Blockchain Social Network
aboutPage.title: About BSN
aboutPage.subtitle: Our mission, vision and the team behind the Blockchain Social Network

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: BSN was founded with a clear mission: to put the power over social networks back in the hands of users. We believe that your data should belong to you, not to big tech corporations.
mission.paragraph2: By integrating blockchain technology, we create a transparent, decentralized, and user-oriented social network that respects privacy while providing new opportunities for interaction and value creation.
mission.paragraph3: Our goal is to create a platform that is not only technologically advanced but also operated ethically and sustainably - with a community that actively participates in governance.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.paragraph1: We envision a future where social networks are no longer controlled by centralized companies, but by the users themselves - transparent, fair, and community-driven.
vision.paragraph2: BSN aims to bridge the gap between the traditional Web2 world and the emerging Web3 ecosystem by combining the user-friendliness of classic social media with the benefits of blockchain technology.
vision.paragraph3: In the long term, we aspire to become a fully decentralized protocol that is supported and developed by the community - a truly democratic social network for the digital age.

overview.title: What is BSN?
overview.description: BSN (Blockchain Social Network) is a decentralized social network based on blockchain technology. It gives users full control over their data and enables new forms of interaction and value creation.

documentation.title: Our Documentation
documentation.description: Our documentation is divided into several areas to make it as easy as possible for you to get started with BSN. Choose an area that interests you:

items.question: What is BSN?
items.answer: BSN (Blockchain Social Network) is a decentralized social network based on blockchain technology. It gives users full control over their data and enables new forms of interaction and value creation.

items.question: How does token mining work?
items.answer: BSN uses a proof-of-contribution mechanism where users are rewarded for valuable contributions to the network. This includes creating high-quality content, participating in moderation, and other activities that contribute to the health of the network.

items.question: Is BSN open source?
items.answer: Yes, BSN is an open-source project. The source code is available on GitHub, and we encourage developers to contribute to the project. Our goal is to create a transparent and community-developed social network.

items.question: How is my data protected?
items.answer: BSN stores personal data decentrally and encrypted. You retain full control over your data and decide what information you want to share. Your data is not sold for advertising purposes or used without your consent.

items.question: Which blockchain does BSN use?
items.answer: BSN is blockchain-agnostic and supports multiple blockchains, including Ethereum and Polygon. This allows users to choose the blockchain that best suits their needs, whether in terms of cost, speed, or functionality.

items.question: How can I contribute to the project?
items.answer: There are many ways to contribute to the BSN project: as a developer through code contributions, as a community member through feedback and ideas, as a content creator through high-quality content, or as an ambassador by spreading the project.

api.title: API Documentation
api.description: Our API allows developers to access BSN data and functions and create their own applications.

whitepaper.title: Whitepaper
whitepaper.description: Our whitepaper describes the technical details and vision behind BSN.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: BSN was founded with the vision of creating a social network that is owned and controlled by its users. By integrating blockchain technology, we create a platform that enables transparency, privacy, and new forms of value creation.

sections.title: Technical Architecture
sections.content: BSN is based on a hybrid architecture that combines central and decentralized components to combine user-friendliness with the benefits of blockchain. Core functionalities such as identity, data, and transactions are stored on the blockchain, while the user interface and certain functions are centrally hosted to ensure optimal performance.

sections.title: Tokenomics
sections.content: The BSN token is the heart of the ecosystem and serves several purposes: as a governance token for the DAO, as a reward for contributions to the network, and as a means of payment within the platform. The token design has been carefully developed to promote a sustainable and growing ecosystem.

sections.title: Governance
sections.content: BSN is managed as a DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization) where token holders can vote on platform changes. The governance model uses quadratic voting to ensure fair decision-making and prevent power concentration.

sections.title: Roadmap
sections.content: The development of BSN is divided into several phases, starting with the alpha version and ending with a fully decentralized protocol. Each phase builds on the previous one and adds new features and improvements.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter and be the first to know about platform updates, token events, and exclusive community offers.
newsletter.privacy: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe at any time.

footer.description: Decentralized social networking platform built on blockchain technology, empowering users with full control over their data, identity, and digital interactions.

communityPage.title: BSN Community
communityPage.subtitle: Become part of our growing community and shape the future of social networks
communityPage.description: BSN is more than just a platform - it's a community of like-minded individuals who believe in a decentralized, user-oriented future of social networks. Join us and help make this vision a reality.

ambassadors.title: Community Ambassadors
ambassadors.description: Our ambassadors help support and expand the BSN community. They are your first point of contact for questions and concerns.

guidelines.title: Community Guidelines
guidelines.description: To ensure a positive and productive community experience for everyone, we ask all members to adhere to the following guidelines:
guidelines.rule1: Be respectful and friendly to other community members, regardless of background, experience, or opinion.
guidelines.rule2: No harassment, hate speech, or discriminatory behavior of any kind.
guidelines.rule3: No spam, advertising, or self-promoting content without prior permission.
guidelines.rule4: Respect the privacy of other members and do not share personal information without permission.
guidelines.rule5: Follow the instructions of moderators and administrators.

featuresPage.title: Features
featuresPage.subtitle: Discover all the powerful features of the BSN platform

categories.title: Social Features
categories.description: Discover the social functions of the BSN network

features.title: Decentralized Profile
features.description: Your BSN profile belongs to you. All your data is stored decentrally and you maintain full control.
details: Complete data control by the user

features.title: Crypto Messenger
features.description: Communicate securely and privately with end-to-end encryption. Send messages, cryptocurrencies, and NFTs directly to other users.
details: File deletion after time expiration possible

features.title: Community Groups
features.description: Create and join groups based on common interests. All group decisions are transparently stored on the blockchain.

categories.title: Blockchain Features
categories.description: Experience the benefits of blockchain integration

features.title: Integrated Wallet
features.description: Manage your cryptocurrencies and NFTs directly in the BSN platform without external wallets.
details: Seamless integration with all BSN functions
Secure key management with recovery options

features.title: Token Mining
features.description: Earn BSN tokens through active participation in the network. The more value you create for the community, the more you earn.
details: Rewards for quality content and engagement
Daily mining limits to prevent spam

features.title: NFT Marketplace
features.description: Create, buy, and sell NFTs directly on the platform. Share your creations with the community and earn from them.
details: Easy NFT creation without technical know-how
Low transaction fees through Layer-2 integration

features.title: DAO Governance
features.description: As a BSN token holder, you can vote on platform changes and actively participate in development.
details: Quadratic voting for fair decision making

features.title: Decentralized Moderation
features.description: The community moderates content together. No central team decides what is allowed and what is not.
details: Incentives for fair and consistent moderation

features.title: Transparent Finances
features.description: All platform revenue and expenses are transparently displayed on the blockchain and can be viewed by anyone.
details: Real-time financial reporting on the blockchain
Automated profit distribution to token holders

tokenReservationPage.title: BSN Token Reservation
tokenReservationPage.subtitle: Secure your BSN tokens now and be part of the revolution
tokenReservationPage.paragraph1: The BSN Token Reservation allows you to reserve BSN tokens before the official launch.
tokenReservationPage.paragraph2: The reserved tokens will be sent directly to your wallet after the official launch. You can choose between various payment methods, including ETH, USDT, and USDC.
tokenReservationPage.paragraph3: The current price is $0.05 per token. The minimum amount for a reservation is $50, the maximum amount is $5000.
tokenReservationPage.paragraph4: BSN tokens offer various benefits within the ecosystem, including reduced fees, voting rights in the DAO, and access to exclusive features.
tokenReservationPage.successMessage: Thank you for your reservation. We'll contact you with further instructions.

faucetPage.title: BSN Faucet
faucetPage.subtitle: Get free BSN tokens to test the platform
faucetPage.paragraph1: The BSN Faucet allows you to get free BSN tokens to try out the various functions of the platform.
faucetPage.paragraph2: The tokens can be used for various actions on the platform, such as creating posts, participating in governance votes, or testing wallet functionalities.
faucetPage.paragraph3: Please note that you can request tokens every 4 hours and that a wallet connection is required.

referralPage.title: BSN Referral Program
referralPage.subtitle: Invite friends and receive rewards for each successful registration
referralPage.paragraph1: The BSN Referral Program rewards you for inviting new users to the platform.
referralPage.paragraph2: For every friend who registers via your personal referral link and buys at least 100 BSN tokens, you receive 50 BSN tokens as a reward.
referralPage.paragraph3: There is no limit to the number of friends you can invite. The more friends sign up, the more tokens you receive!
